alt: Abstract painting with warm golden tones and geometric shapes
title: Morning Light
description: Inspired by the first rays of sunlight filtering through studio windows, this piece explores the interplay between warmth and structure.

alt: Blue and white abstract seascape with textured brushwork
title: Coastal Memory
description: A meditation on the rhythms of the sea, capturing the essence of tide and foam through layered pigments.
materials: Acrylic and mixed media on canvas

alt: Geometric abstract with bold lines and muted earth tones
title: Urban Fragments
description: Deconstructed cityscapes reassembled as emotional landscapes, reflecting the complexity of modern life.
